founder.name: Abderrahmen Brinis
founder.title: Founder & Senior Software Engineer
founder.bio: Senior Software Engineer with over 7+ years of experience, specializing in Web3, blockchain technologies, and fullstack web development. Based in Tunis, Tunisia, Abderrahmen combines technical excellence with educational expertise as a Unity3D teacher at ISSATso University.
founder.education: IT Engineer, Unity3D Teacher at ISSATso University
achievements: Level 2 Fiverr Seller with 100+ completed projects
Expert in AR/VR development with Vuforia and ARCore
Created multiple educational courses on Udemy

company.name: Wings
company.description: Wings is a professional web development agency founded by Abderrahmen Brinis. We specialize in creating high-performance websites and applications that are designed to launch quickly, scale easily, and make an impact from day one.
company.mission: To empower businesses with cutting-edge digital solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage through innovative technology and exceptional user experiences.
company.vision: To be the trusted technology partner for businesses worldwide, transforming ideas into powerful digital realities that exceed expectations.
values: Efficiency: Speedy development cycles without sacrificing quality
Trust: Building long-term partnerships through reliability and transparency
Innovation: Staying ahead with emerging technologies like AR/VR and blockchain
Excellence: Delivering solutions that exceed client expectations
Growth: Helping businesses scale and succeed in the digital landscape
